welcome.top: Bass Station wishes you all a
ticker: Return (from the beyond) every Saturday night for (mostly) living DJs!
Haunt our Discord and the VRChat group for the latest updates!

event.top: Join us for one final haunt at
ticker: Don't become a desiccated husk just yet, remember to hydrate often~!
We've moved on to a better place.... Bluesky! Follow us @bassstationvr.bsky.social
We appreciate your patience in cleaning up the goop leaks over this last month. The culprit has been found and we are re-burying him as we speak.

performers.name: Thunder_Kick
ticker: Welcome tonight to the dearly departed... and those departing now from platform 2 for Drum and Bass!
'Rolled a drum kit off the hill. Sounded jazzy'

performers.name: CosmicWinds
ticker: Please can all passengers, living or dead, welcome our first newcomer to Bass Station this evening!
This new DJ is a direct service to Bass House!

performers.name: PandaTron
ticker: This DJ will warm you to your very soul as they are timetabled to Freestyle!

performers.name: Senky
ticker: It is time for our final destination and our second newcomer, please welcome them to their first time playing at the Bass Station!
This dragon is an express service to Techno.

performers.name: **TERMINATES HERE**
ticker: This event terminates here. Goodnight out there..... whatever you are~
See you all next week as we try and clean up all this blue goop.
Please ensure you have all tickets to the afterlife ready for inspection. Fare dodgers will be fed to the Poopergeist.
We've moved on to a better place.... Bluesky! Follow us @bassstationvr.bsky.social
